configurePresets.name: debug
configurePresets.description: Debug configuration with the default system compiler, including tests. The path to dependencies is set via environment variables.

configurePresets.name: release
configurePresets.description: Release configuration with the default system compiler, including tests. The path to dependencies is set via environment variables. This is used in CI to generate the default release.

configurePresets.name: relwithdebinfo
configurePresets.description: RelWithDebInfo configuration with the default system compiler, including tests. The path to dependencies is set via environment variables. This is used in CI to generate the default release on Windows.

configurePresets.name: dist
configurePresets.description: Distribution base configuration with the default system compiler, not including tests. The path to dependencies is set via environment variables. This can be used by users to generate a distribution bypassing the CMake test step.
